text:
="preserve">Emyr Humphreys (15 April 1919 – 30 September 2020) was a Welsh novelist, poet, and author. During his long bilingual writing career, he published over twenty novels, which include such classics as "A Toy Epic" (1958), "Outside the House of Baal" (1965), and "The Land of the Living"
Humphreys died on 30 September 2020 at the age of 101.
